name: "yoco" you only color once
description:
"YOCO"you only code once [demo] is a survival game you have no weapons no items to use and there is other buckets trying to kill you with their knives your goal is survive 

to create the game i used python and pygame library to make the game

for new games follow me 

thanx to me for creating this demo game and thank you for reading
this is a demo game for the mini jam #111 i didnt have the time to add another features you are a red bucket who run from black buckets :) i just need to add weapons/ammo and improve the map  i'm just a begginer and the fact that i created this demo all by myself and with a little help of pygame docs making me shocked  and special thanx to skailiator oh wait it is me lmao oh wait i forgot do you see that health bar in the screen shots it's actually doesnt decrease hahaha and the enemies arent real they are just an illusion every game is an illusion even this text is an illusion for your brain .well i'm not expecting to people to play this crap but i will make better games in the future.

ps: omg this is my first ever game i feel verry proud of myself
